page.title: 09CHURCH OF ENGLAND: CHAPELS
page.content: 1. {Exeter University}has a full-time chaplain for 5000 students and staff. The main Sunday service is Sung Eucharist. Other uses include daily worship, weekly discussion/Bible study groups, weddings, baptisms, confirmations and memorial services. The usual term-time attendance is {60/70.}Worshippers arrange social events, help other students and support local old people and children. { {2.Mercer House and Chapel. The Warden of this residential centre{ is a priest. Uses include part-time training of Ordinands, voluntary church workers and local clergy. It is used for{conferences,}but Youth groups and private guests are welcomed. The Chapel is available for any Christian worship. It accommodates{30 people.
